item.title: Blog: FHE.org 2025 conference talk and slides
item.description: Jeremy Kun gave a talk at the FHE.org 2025 conference in Sofia last month. The video has been posted on YouTube, and the slides can be found here.

item.title: Blog: HEIR meeting 2023-07-18
item.description:
The third HEIR meeting was 2023-07-18 (notes).

We decided to schedule future meetings every two weeks, with alternating focus on MLIR and Hardware. See the meeting calendar to join. (direct link to the calendar)

item.title: Blog: Hello, World!
item.description:
Hello, world! We’re starting a project to unify homomorphic encryption compiler IRs.

Our initial meeting was 2023-05-30 (read-only copy of the minutes). Stay tuned for future updates while we work out a meeting schedule.
